com.honeywell.relay

Class RelayBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.honeywell.relay.RelayBoard

  • public class RelayBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    The RelayBoard application allows control of the KMTronic relay boards for zone/fault creation on test panels.
    Since:
    31-10-2016
    Version:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    Tony Crichton

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RelayBoard(java.lang.String comPort)
      This constructor is used to create serial connection to USB controller.

        public java.lang.String setFault(java.lang.String failure,

                          throws jssc.SerialPortException,
                                 java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method is used to create panel system faults.
        Parameters:
        failure - This is the type of failure to be created
        state - This is the zone state to be created

        jssc.SerialPortException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • setFault

        public java.lang.String setFault(java.lang.String failure,
                                 int state,
                                 int debounce)
                          throws jssc.SerialPortException,
                                 java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method is used to create panel system faults with debounce time.
        Parameters:
        failure - This is the type of failure to be created
        state - This is the zone state to be created
        debounce - This is the programmed debounce time (ms)
        Throws:
        jssc.SerialPortException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • setZone

        public java.lang.String setZone(java.lang.String zone,
                                int state,
                                int debounce,
                                int offset)
                         throws jssc.SerialPortException,
                                java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method is used to create panel zone activation with debounce time and addr offset.
        Parameters:
        zone - This is the zone to be activated
        state - This is the zone state to be created
        debounce - This is the programmed debounce time (ms)
        offset - This is the RelayBoard addr offset (0 or 1)
        Throws:
        jssc.SerialPortException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • setZone

        public java.lang.String setZone(java.lang.String zone,
                                int state,
                                int offset)
                         throws jssc.SerialPortException,
                                java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method is used to create panel zone activation with debounce time and addr offset.
        Parameters:
        zone - This is the zone to be activated
        state - This is the zone state to be created
        offset - This is the RelayBoard addr offset (0 or 1)
        Throws:
        jssc.SerialPortException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
